column1: #Text=Mr. Gallos did not respond to numerous questions .
#Text=Instead of emailing Wikinews with his sole answer , as was asked , he posted it directly to Wikinews .

#Text=is general manager of Kathite Industries , makers of a chimney cleaner ; " As Kathite is a seasonal occupation , I am also a full time Letter Carrier for Canada Post , I love the exercise and could certainly use it , and it keeps me in touch with the public .
